Title: Elegant Long Evening Dress

Sku: P107

Sizes: 10, 4, 14, 6, 8, 12

Category: evening, formal-gowns

Featured-image: P107-mint-elegant-long-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: Chic and stylish gown is asymmetrical with a ruffled front and a sweeping train. The form fitting gown is belted with sparkling bead and extends to the V-shape open back. The neckline of the gown is a circular scoop with a pee-a-boo V-plunge.
